segments.text: Good evening , madam . Did you ring for service ? Who can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . The light in this room is too dim . Please get me a brighter one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly , madam . I'll be back right away . Do you mind if I move your things ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . How is the light now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's much better now . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're welcome . And if you need any other things , please let us know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ah , yes , the room is too cold for me . I feel rather cold when I sleep . Can you turn off the air-conditioning ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The air-conditioning is already off , madam .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like an extra blanket ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . And would you please get me some hot water , too ? I think I need to take some medicine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly , madam . I'll be right back . Here is a blanket and hot water for you . Anything else ?
segments.speaker: S1
